mention.text: Xerox PARC that expand and redefine the role of recognition technology in document-oriented applications
the development of systems that provide functionality similar to that of text processors but operate directly on audio and scanned image data
the use of speech and text-image recognition to retrieve arbitrary , user-specified information from documents with signal content
